title: Drawing, "Furniture, Decorative Arts and Design", 1992
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right: VLADIMIR KAGAN, A.S.I.D. PRES. / THE VLADIMIR KAGAN DESIGN GROUP INC. / 1185 PARK AVENUE / NEW YORK, N.Y. 10128 / TEL. (212) 289-0031 FAX (212) 360-7307
signed: Signed in black ink with monogram, lower left: VK 92-4 [encircled]; in blue ink, lower center: Vladimir Kagan 92
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: SCALE 1"=1'-0"; lower right: DIRECTIONAL APRIL 1992; in blue ink, lower right: ©1992
description: Design for armchair, plans, elevations, and perspectives, including scales.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Furniture, Decorative Arts and Design", 1992.
1992. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Vladimir Kagan. 1992-74-3.
